page.title: 12 A day in the life of.....
page.content: We would usually spend a leisure day either going to a neighbouring town eg Romford,Southend or Basildon looking around the markets and shops and then finishing up in Macdonalds.If we go to Southend during the summer we would spend most of our time along the seafront,either swimming or sunbathing or going in the amusements or the fair.Sometimes of a Wednsday evening you could find us in one of Basildons discos called Racquels.This is a night specially set aside for the 14-18 year olds.Sometimes of a Saturday night we go to a disco that is being held up at the Wickford Community centre or if a mate has a party we would go there.If there are no parties or discos on a Saturday or any other night we would either walk around the town having a laugh or going in the community centre where you can play pool,darts or cards
